description: This PHP source file handles editing of a port forwarding service entry within a web-based home security system management interface. It includes server-side logic for retrieving current port forwarding configuration based on an identifier, as well as client-side JavaScript for form validation and submission to update the settings.

methods.name: preg_match
methods.description: PHP function used for validating the 'id' GET parameter to ensure it conforms to a numeric pattern.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: External function to retrieve port forwarding configuration values from the device configuration.
